oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Garnett Andrews order, 1864 September 24
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Confederate States of America. War Department
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Military order for Garnett Andrews to form a battalion of infantry from among the foreigners and prisoners of war at Millen, Andersonville, and other points in Georgia.
